course.name: Go Course
course.description: Interactive Go programming course with 18 modules covering fundamentals, CLI tools, concurrency, testing, algorithms, and capstone projects.

modules.title: Go Quick Reference
modules.description: Commands, links, and common errors for quick lookup

modules.title: Go Fundamentals
modules.description: Variables, types, functions, and control flow. Every concept mapped from Python.

modules.title: Pointers & Memory
modules.description: Pointers demystified. They're not scary â€” they're just addresses. Let's make them click.

modules.title: Structs Deep Dive
modules.description: Go's alternative to classes. Composition over inheritance, methods, and struct tags.

modules.title: Interfaces & Polymorphism
modules.description: Implicit interfaces, type assertions, and thinking in behaviors. This is Go's secret weapon.

modules.title: Data Structures
modules.description: Slices deep dive, maps, and building your own data structures with generics.

modules.title: CLI Foundations
modules.description: Arguments, flags, stdin/stdout, and building tools that feel native to the terminal.

modules.title: Files, YAML & Shell
modules.description: Read files, parse configs, run shell commands. Build a task runner from scratch.

modules.title: Building TUIs
modules.description: Terminal User Interfaces with Bubble Tea. Build interactive CLI apps that look amazing.

modules.title: Error Handling & Testing
modules.description: Go's explicit error handling and how to write tests that actually catch bugs.

modules.title: Design Patterns
modules.description: Patterns that actually matter. Factory, options, strategy, and builder.

modules.title: HTTP & API Design
modules.description: Build REST APIs, make HTTP requests, middleware patterns. Build a GitHub CLI.

modules.title: Concurrency & Goroutines
modules.description: Goroutines, channels, and patterns. The stuff that makes Go actually fast.

modules.title: Project Structure
modules.description: How Go projects grow from one file to many. Packages, visibility, and organization.

modules.title: System Interaction
modules.description: Detecting what's available, running external commands, parsing their output. The glue between Go and the OS.

modules.title: Sets & Diffing
modules.description: Set operations are everywhere. Comparing lists, finding differences, computing what changed.

modules.title: Unit Testing
modules.description: Testing individual functions and components in isolation. Go's testing is simple but powerful.

modules.title: Integration Testing
modules.description: Testing real components working together: HTTP servers, databases, file systems, external services.

modules.title: Algorithms & Problem Solving
modules.description: Big O notation, algorithm patterns, and fundamental data structure implementations in Go.

projects.title: Task Runner
projects.description: Build a simple task runner that reads YAML configs and executes commands. Applies concepts from Module 7.

projects.title: File Browser
projects.description: Build an interactive terminal file browser using Bubble Tea. Applies concepts from Module 8.

projects.title: GitHub CLI
projects.description: Build a CLI tool that interacts with the GitHub API. Applies concepts from Module 11.

projects.title: Parallel Downloader
projects.description: Build a concurrent file downloader with progress tracking. Applies concepts from Module 12.
